pkgmetadata.longdescription: # METASPACE Python clientPython package that provides programmatic access to [METASPACE](https://metaspace2020.eu).## Applications* Running batch jobs* Exploratory analysis of submitted data* Quick access to things hidden from web interface (such as location of files on S3 and other metadata)## InstallationYou need to have **Python 3.6 or higher** to use this library.```pip install metaspace2020```## DocumentationThe package documentation is available at [metaspace2020.readthedocs.io](https://metaspace2020.readthedocs.io)## Acknowledgements and license[See the top-level README](../../README.md#acknowledgements)
